text_block_list.text: Come on, keep up!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Haaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Let's go, Rob Royyy!!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(I'm still too slow! I need to run at her level...!! 
I need to be faster, faster...!!)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Next―― the 2400 meter.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
......... 
Rob Roy―― Are you ready?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
......I can do this, don't worry! 
You can handle it effortlessly, so I should be able to do it too!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――Good. 
――Your time―― is still behind pace. 
――Do not stop until you succeed.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Haaaahhhh...!!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ――I want to win this autumn, no matter what.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I want to be like Kris S-san. 
Unyielding, unwavering, accomplishing exactly what she sets out 
to accomplish.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I want nothing more than to be such a 『hero』 . 
To walk the same path of greatness as you... 
No. To do the impossible and surpass you――!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――...... 
――One more time, Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am!!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Ahhh, phew...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Good going, Rob Roy! 
You got everything done!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
(Kris S-san... She was ahead of me the entire time... 
But she hasn't so much as broken a sweat...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(...I'm lacking stamina. And speed. And power. 
It's as if I'm standing at the base of an enormous mountain――)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Your time―― was a new best.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: You're faster―― much faster―― than before.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
The goal she set was to for you to get a new best time! 
And you did it, Rob Roy! 
Didn't she, Kris S?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: You are―― My achievement.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Your achievement...?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――To bring a revolution―― to the world of Japanese racing. 
――That is my mission.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
To support the next generation―― Is part of that mission. 
However――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
――You said―― That you looked up to me. 
――That you would follow my lead.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
You told me―― That I impacted you. Hearing your words―― 
The path you set out on―― I understood―― 
You are what―― My mission achieved.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: You gave me―― You are. ――My proudest achievement.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: So―― I wanted to give you―― an achievement. ――In return―― for looking up to me.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Kris S-san...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
T-thank you, so much...! 
I still have a long way to go to live up to your expectations, 
but I'll grow stronger so I can meet them!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
No. 
――You already have.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Wh――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
My mission today―― was to demonstrate―― your growth. 
You have grown―― undoubtedly―― strong.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ――Rob Roy. You are... ――magnificent.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: 『Magnificent』, Zenno Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Ahhhh...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe wants to 『be there』 for Zenno Rob Roy. 
So please...  allow for 『support』. 
At the 『Moon Viewing Social』, too.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Thank you. ...I wanted to tell you that today. 
I want to thank you for the kindness you've given me until now, 
and to accept all the kindness you'll give me in the future.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I never say "sorry" to a helping hand. 
I smile and say "Thank you", and they smile back!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
(I need to properly accept their kindness. 
Their kindness... And their praise.)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
We're givin' you a super-duper impressive achievement. 
Will you accept it?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: ...I will.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Thank you, all of you, for everything!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ――Good ―― Stand proud, Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Okay, girls, just pick a seat, grab a drink, and hang tight. 
We'll have a toast once everyone's here.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
――Whoa. 
Looking good, you two.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text: ――Sphira. ――Thank you!
text_block_list.name: The Pair

text_block_list.text: Hehe. Looks like we're going to have a great Moon Viewing. ――Everyone here? All right. Cheeeeers!
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
